destinations.title: Pokhara
destinations.text: Nestled in the lap of the majestic Annapurna mountain range, Pokhara is one of Nepal's most picturesque and serene cities. Often referred to as the “Gateway to the Himalayas,” Pokhara offers a stunning blend of natural beauty, adventure, and cultural richness.

destinations.title: Kathmandu
destinations.text: Kathmandu, the vibrant capital of Nepal, is a city where ancient history and spiritual heritage blend seamlessly with the pulse of modern life. Located in the Kathmandu Valley and surrounded by green hills, this bustling metropolis is home to seven UNESCO World Heritage Sites

destinations.title: Mustang
destinations.text: Hidden beyond the towering peaks of the Himalayas lies Mustang, one of Nepal’s most mystical and remote regions. Known as the Last Forbidden Kingdom

destinations.title: Chitwan
destinations.text: Located in the southern lowlands of Nepal, Chitwan is home to one of Asia’s finest wildlife reserves—Chitwan National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

packages.title: Mt. Everest
packages.text: Rising to an awe-inspiring height of 8,848.86 meters (29,031.7 feet), Mount Everest, known as Sagarmatha in Nepali and Chomolungma in Tibetan.

packages.title: Birthplace of Lord Buddha
packages.text: Mesmerizing experience on the tranquil waters of Dal Lake, exploring Srinagar’s floating gardens, houseboats, and majestic mountain views.

packages.title: Rara Lakes
